paper.title: How to construct pseudorandom and super pseudorandom permutations from one single pseudorandom function
paper.venue: Theory and Application of Cryptographic Techniques
paper.abstract: In this paper we will solve two open problems concerning pseudorandom permutations :[12],"We will see that it is possible to obtain a pseudorandom permutation generator with only three rounds of DES - like permutation and a single pseudorandom function.
